data.name: ROUGH LOVE
data.detailed_description:
I’m offering you my pain. My blood. My pleasure. I’m offering you the right to whip and fuck. To debase and harm. I’m offering to fight your needs with my own. I’m willing to join you in the darkness and find pleasure in excruciating pain. I’m willing to be your monster.


ROUGH LOVE is a fully animated and voiced ASMR erotic adventure. Sit back, relax and progress through a linear story and immerse yourself with all your senses. Please use headphones for the perfect experience!

Features
  • 3D
  • Fully Animated
  • Fully voiced
  • Subtitles
  • Controls to replay scenes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Modern CPU
  • Graphics: Modern graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains adult-only sexual language, nudity and uncensored sexual acts.

Everything is consensual in this story, but it does walk the line between rape fantasy and rough sex.
